title: Four more MPs including Pilleyan sworn in as State Ministers
body_lines: Four more MPs including Sivanesathurai Chandrakanthan alias Pilleyan was sworn in as State Ministers today before President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.
Accordingly,  Sivanesathurai Chandrakanthan was appointed as State Minister of Rural Road Development while  S. Viyalendran was appointed as State Minister of Youth and Sports.
Mohammed Musharaf was sworn in as State Minister of Textiles Production Development and
Suren Raghavan was sworn in as State Minister of Higher Education.
Suren Raghavan earlier was appointed as State Minister for Education Services and Reforms.
It was ammended to State Minister of Higher Education. (Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
